data.value: Katso idea
T‰ysin yhden ihmisen kokemus ilman ryhm‰painetta

Kertos‰e:
En tahtonut tapella, tahdo erota,
en kuvitellut koskaan t‰n loppuvan,
en tahtonut sua rikkoo, tehd‰ meille n‰in mut vaik
kuinka rakastaakin toinen toistaan j‰lleen satuttaa


S‰e 1:
Anteeks kulta ett‰ en oo v‰h‰‰n aikaan soittanut
ollaan oltuu kiireisii ja tyˆst‰ oon vain toipunut
Mul on ik‰v‰ ja haluisin sut t‰nne,
makaamaan rannal kun yll‰ loistaa t‰hdet
Mietin ett‰ olisit l‰mmin mun syliss‰
vannoin pysyy mukanas yl‰  ja ala m‰iss‰,
Silti aika kuluu pois mut vieden
suudelmat sun on en‰‰ muistois mielen
Niinku se kosketuksen mielikuva, kun
suutelen sua ja me yhes keinutaan
ku ilta tummuu, ja kuulen vain sut
kuu loistaa suhun ja hikeen kastut
Kai molemmat yritti liian v‰h‰n koska
tultiin t‰h‰n eik‰ tarpeeks n‰h‰
Kohta viel‰ palaan taas, tule rakas vastaan
Ollaan viel‰ viisaampii et voidaan taas rakastaa


S‰e 2:
Tuntu niinku tarvitsin  jonkun toisen
nimes unohtuu ja muihin nimiin sen sotken
Kun m‰ viimeks l‰hin ovet paukkuen
tuli vastaan nainen uutta toivoo huokuen
M‰ torjuin iloiset tunteet  mut meid‰n
katseet kun kohtas katos murheet
Miten tunteen sammutan?  En tii‰, mutta
otteeseen mut se saa,  en kiell‰
M‰ pelk‰‰n sit‰ taas  et ihastun
tai et rakastun ja petyn enk‰ palaudu
En haluu rakastuu toiseen joka heti j‰tt‰‰
aika on arvokasta kahestaan viett‰‰
Enk‰ haluu yksin‰‰n tunnevuoristorataan,
mut sen kyll‰ kest‰‰ kun on joku jolle jakaa
En sulle tunnusta, ett‰ oot mun ainoa,
jos s‰ tahot niin, huomaat olevas mun vaimona


Bridge:
V‰lil sanoin et mua kaduttaa, tahdoin riidat unohtaa,
mut ne s‰ilyy ain sun sis‰ll‰, vaik m‰ en huomaiskaan
M‰ n‰ytt‰nyt en tarpeeksi, kuinka paljon v‰litin
Voin m‰ olla taas nyt mukava, mit‰ sill‰ korjaisin

Chorus:
I didn't want to fight, I don't want to break up,
i never imagined this would end
I didn't mean to break you, to do this to us, but...
no matter how one loves the other, one hurts the other again


Verse 1a:
Sorry honey I haven't called in a while
I've been busy and I've just recovered from work
I miss you and I want you here
to lie down on the beach when there are only stars above

Verse 1b:
I dream how you would be warm in my arms
I promised to stay with you through the ups and downs
Still, time passes by taking me away
your kisses are memories in my mind now

Verse 1c:
Like that vision of us touching
in wich I kiss you and we rock together
when the night gets dark, and the only thing I hear is you
the moon shines on you and you are drenched in sweat

Verse 1d:
I guess neither of us tried enough
because we came here and don't see enough of each other
I'll be back in a moment, come meet me wife
Let's be a little wiser so that we can love again


Verse 2a:
I feel like I need someone else
I forget your name and I mess it up with another name
When I left with slamming doors last time,
a woman came up with an air of hope

Verse 2b:
I rejected the happy feelings,
but when our eyes met, the sorrows disappeared
How to turn off the feeling? I don't know
but sometimes it gets me, I won't deny

Verse 2c:
I'm afraid that I'll fall in love again
or that I fall in love, and fail and never recover
I don't want to fall in love with someone who immediately leaves
time is precious to spend alone with someone

Verse 2d:
And I don't want to ride the emotional roller coaster alone anymore,
but you can handle it when you share everything
I won't confess to you that you are my only one,
if you want, you will realize that you are my wife


Bridge:
Sometimes I said I was sorry, I wanted to forget the fights,
but they remain inside me, even if I don't notice it
I didn't show enough how much I cared
I can be nice to you again now, what would I fix with its
Katso idea
Maksimoi itsem‰‰r‰‰misoikeuden ja valinnanvapauden
Ihmiset vain toistavat huonoja piirteit‰‰n, eiv‰tk‰ voi asialle mit‰‰n
'Satutamme toisiamme aina uudestaan' on melko rankaisevaa
Asenne on melko hyv‰ksyv‰ kaikkia ihmisten huonoja piirteit‰ kohtaan
'katkeransuloisuutta, jossa henkilˆ saa helpotusta kielteisist‰ asioista' kuvastaa kertos‰ett‰. Toisaalta s‰keet on melko iloisia v‰lill‰.
Pohditaan vakavissaan omia tunnemyrskyj‰ ja mit‰ asialle voisi tehd‰
Kevyet asiat sanotaan merkityksellisesti ja kohtalomaisesti, joten melko dramaattinen yleiss‰vy.
Kertos‰e on melko toivoton: 'satutamme toisiamme aina uudestaan'. Toisaalta, s‰e on melko toiveikas.
Asioista n‰hd‰‰n huonot puolet, etenkin kertsiss‰: 'mut ne s‰ilyy ain sun sis‰ll‰'.
Avoin uusille parisuhteille ja seikkailuille
Uuden kumppanin tapaaminen on todella herkk‰‰. Myˆs tappelu on herkk‰‰ normaaliin n‰hden.
Puhutaan vaimosta ja siit‰ ett‰ on vain yksi parisuhde kerrallaan.
Koko kappaleen er‰s m‰‰rite on normaali heteroseksuaalinen parisuhde.
Kappalessa haetaan kauneutta normaaleilla parisuhdesymboleilla, jotka eiv‰t ole kuitenkaan liian kliseisi‰, kuten rakastelua hiekkarannalla.
Sallitaan miehen muuttuminen parisuhteessa ja ajautuminen omalle tielleen

Chorus 1a:
I didn't want to fight, I don't want to break up
I never imagined this would end.
I didn't mean to break you, make us like this
but no matter how much I love, one of us hurts the other again.

Verse 1a:
I'm not calling as much as I use to, busy recovering from work
Missing you, wishing you were here, lying down on the beach with only stars above
Verse 1b:
I'm just dreaming how you'd be warm in my arms
Promising to stay through ups and downs, time passing by taking me away. Kisses now are only memories
Verse 1c:
Touching each other and I kiss you and we rock together
When the night gets dark, the only thing I hear is you. The moon shining on you, drenched in sweat
Verse 1d:
Not trying enough, not being here, not seeing enough of each other
I'm still coming back in a moment, meeting my wife. Little bit wiser, able to love again

Verse 2a:
Needing someone else, forgetting your name and messing it up with another name
Leaving last time with a slamming door. A woman coming up with an aura of hope
Verse 2b:
Rejecting happy feelings when our eyes meet and sorrows disappears
Not knowing how to turn off the feeling. Sometimes it still gets me, I won't deny
Verse 2c:
Afraid of falling in love again and failing and never recovering
With someone who immediately leaves, time so precious spending it alone with you
Verse 2d:
Not wanting to ride the emotional rollercoaster alone anymore
Being able to handle it when we share everything
Not confessing to you that you're my only one
If you want to realize that you were my wife

Bridge:
I was sorry, wanting to forget the fights
The fights remaining inside me, not noticing
Not showing how much I care, being nice to you again, now
Able to fix it with it too

Kertos 1a:
En halua taistella, En halua rikkoa meit‰
En ollut kuvitellut ett‰ t‰m‰ loppuisi.
En tarkoittanut s‰rke‰ sinua, tehd‰ meist‰ t‰llaisia
mutta rakastin kuinka vaan, joskus me toisemme taas satutamme.

Kausi 1a:
En ole soittanut niin paljon kuin ennen, kiireelt‰ tˆist‰ toipuen
Kaipaatte sinua, mieliin toivoen ett‰ olisit t‰‰ll‰ makuulle vain t‰hdet ylh‰‰ll‰
Kausi 1b:
Unelmoin ihania kun me olisimme toisiamme l‰mmˆss‰ halaamassa
Lupaamassa ett‰ pysymme rakkaana vaikka mit‰‰n tullisikin, aika kulkee vierell‰mme ja pois
Suudelmat ovat nyt vain muistoja
Kausi 1c:
Kosketellen, suutellen hiljaa ja me keinumme yhdess‰
Kun yˆ tummuu, ainoat ‰‰net mit‰ kuulen ovat sinun
Kuuna sinua valaiseepi, hikin‰kin t‰ynn‰
Kausi 1d:
Ei tarvitaan enemp‰‰, ei olla l‰sn‰ tarpeeksi, ei n‰hd‰ toisiamme tarpeeksi
Edelleen tulemme takaisin hetken, tapaamaan vaimoni
Vaan hieman viisaampana, able to love again

Kausi 2a:
Tarvitsen jonkun muun, unohdan nimesi ja sekoitan se jonkun muun kanssa
Viimeisen kerran l‰hdin lukitulla oven takana
Nainen tulee esiin toivon auringolla
Kausi 2b:
Kun meid‰n silm‰mme kohtaavat hymyn hylk‰‰mme ja surut katoavat,
En osaa kupita tunnettani ja hetkinen se viel‰ v‰lill‰ meit‰ ahdistaa
Kausi 2c:
Pelk‰‰n ett‰ rakastun taas ja ep‰onnistun enk‰ en‰‰ toipu,
kanssasi jonka j‰lkeen heti poistuminen, ajassa t‰rke‰‰ ja siihen vierell‰sin sinun
Kausi 2d:
En en‰‰ halua ratsasta huiput ja laaksoja yksin
Voi selvit‰ mit‰ tahansa, kun jaoimme kaiken
En tunnusta ett‰ s‰ oot se ainoin
Jos huomaat oot ollut vaimoni

Silta:
Olen pahoillani, tahtoisin unohtaa n‰‰ taistelut
N‰‰ taistelut pysyy sis‰ll‰, ei huomaa sit‰
En paljoa muista, olla yst‰v‰lisempi taas nyt,
Korjattavissa kaiken sen kanssa

Kertos‰e:
En tahtonut tapella, tahdo erota,
en kuvitellut koskaan t‰n loppuvan,
en tahtonut sua rikkoo, tehd‰ meille n‰in mut vaik
kuinka rakastaakin toinen toistaan j‰lleen satuttaa


S‰e 1:
Anteeks kulta ett‰ en oo v‰h‰‰n aikaan soittanut
ollaan oltuu kiireisii ja tyˆst‰ oon vain toipunut
Mul on ik‰v‰ ja haluisin sut t‰nne,
makaamaan rannal kun yll‰ loistaa t‰hdet
Mietin ett‰ olisit l‰mmin mun syliss‰
vannoin pysyy mukanas yl‰  ja ala m‰iss‰,
Silti aika kuluu pois mut vieden
suudelmat sun on en‰‰ muistois mielen
Niinku se kosketuksen mielikuva, kun
suutelen sua ja me yhes keinutaan
ku ilta tummuu, ja kuulen vain sut
kuu loistaa suhun ja hikeen kastut
Kai molemmat yritti liian v‰h‰n koska
tultiin t‰h‰n eik‰ tarpeeks n‰h‰
Kohta viel‰ palaan taas, tule rakas vastaan
Ollaan viel‰ viisaampii et voidaan taas rakastaa


S‰e 2:
Tuntu niinku tarvitsin  jonkun toisen
nimes unohtuu ja muihin nimiin sen sotken
Kun m‰ viimeks l‰hin ovet paukkuen
tuli vastaan nainen uutta toivoo huokuen
M‰ torjuin iloiset tunteet  mut meid‰n
katseet kun kohtas katos murheet
Miten tunteen sammutan?  En tii‰, mutta
otteeseen mut se saa,  en kiell‰
M‰ pelk‰‰n sit‰ taas  et ihastun
tai et rakastun ja petyn enk‰ palaudu
En haluu rakastuu toiseen joka heti j‰tt‰‰
aika on arvokasta kahestaan viett‰‰
Enk‰ haluu yksin‰‰n tunnevuoristorataan,
mut sen kyll‰ kest‰‰ kun on joku jolle jakaa
En sulle tunnusta, ett‰ oot mun ainoa,
jos s‰ tahot niin, huomaat olevas mun vaimona


Bridge:
V‰lil sanoin et mua kaduttaa, tahdoin riidat unohtaa,
mut ne s‰ilyy ain sun sis‰ll‰, vaik m‰ en huomaiskaan
M‰ n‰ytt‰nyt en tarpeeksi, kuinka paljon v‰litin
Voin m‰ olla taas nyt mukava, mit‰ sill‰ korjaisin

Chorus:
I didn't want to fight, don't want to part ways,
I never imagined it would turn out this way,
I didn't want to break you, do this to us,
No matter how much we love each other, we still hurt each other in the end.

Verse 1:
Sorry my love, I haven't been calling,
We both have had our share of busy days and trying to recover,
I miss you and I'd wish you were here,
Lying on the beach with stars as our ceiling,
I thought I could keep you warm in my embrace,
Promised to stay with you through the good and bad days,
Still time passed and all we have are the memories of our kisses,
Just the thought of us dancing together as the evening falls,
I can only hear you, with the moon light shining over you and me,
We both tried too little in our relationship,
Not seeing it coming, the chances of us being together are fading,
Soon I'll be coming back, come and meet me,
Let's be smarter and fall in love again.

Verse 2:
It felt like I need someone else,
Forgetting the name and filling it with someone else instead,
When I last left, the door swinging behind me,
I saw a woman full of new hope,
I rejected those happy feelings but when our eyes met, the worries faded away,
How do I turn those feelings off? I don't know but it still feels right,
I'm still scared of being taken away again,
If I fall in love and in the end I just break again,
I don't want to fall in love only to be left,
Time was precious when we were together,
I won't admit that you are my only one,
If you want it, soon you'll be my wife.

Bridge:
Sometimes I said that I regret it, wanting to forget the fight,
But they will remain buried in you, even if I don't notice it,
I didn't show enough love, what can I fix now?
Can I be nice again, what can I do with it?

Chorus:
I didn't want to fight, I don't want to break up,
i never imagined this would end
I didn't mean to break you, to do this to us, but...
no matter how one loves the other, one hurts the other again


Verse 1:
Sorry honey I haven't called in a while
I've been busy and I've just recovered from work
I miss you and I want you here
to lie down on the beach when there are only stars above
I dream how you would be warm in my arms
I promised to stay with you through the ups and downs
Still, time passes by taking me away
your kisses are memories in my mind now
Like that vision of us touching
in wich I kiss you and we rock together
when the night gets dark, and the only thing I hear is you
the moon shines on you and you are drenched in sweat
I guess neither of us tried enough
because we came here and don't see enough of each other
I'll be back in a moment, come meet me wife
Let's be a little wiser so that we can love again


Verse 2:
I feel like I need someone else
I forget your name and I mess it up with another name
When I left with slamming doors last time,
a woman came up with an air of hope
I rejected the happy feelings,
but when our eyes met, the sorrows disappeared
How to turn off the feeling? I don't know
but sometimes it gets me, I won't deny
I'm afraid that I'll fall in love again
or that I fall in love, and fail and never recover
I don't want to fall in love with someone who immediately leaves
time is precious to spend alone with someone
And I don't want to ride the emotional roller coaster alone anymore,
but you can handle it when you share everything
I won't confess to you that you are my only one,
if you want, you will realize that you are my wife


Bridge:
Sometimes I said I was sorry, I wanted to forget the fights,
but they remain inside me, even if I don't notice it
I didn't show enough how much I cared
I can be nice to you again now, what would I fix with its

Chorus:
I don't wanna battle, I just want a truce
I thought this would all be more than news
I'm sorry for hurting you, it wasn't my plan,
There's too many miles to get where love began

Verse 1:
My apologies for the late response,
I'm coming down off from this awful stress
What I wouldn't give to just be with you,
Laying out on that beach with just the stars on view
Dreaming of the way you feel in my arms,
I swore that we'd make it through, through these highs and lows
Mama time started busin' by,
All your kisses become memories stuck in my mind
I remember that vision of us embracing,
Kissing softly while we just swayed
As the night got darker, the only sound I heard was you,
The moonlight on you, and how your sweat drenchin' through
Guess we just ain't trying hard enough,
We get to a point, when peepin' lasts so much
I'll be back for sure, meet me there soon,
Let's be smarter now, so for love we can resume

Verse 2:
I felt I had to find someone else,
Your name I forget, and another I just rushed
Slamming doors, I left last time,
The presence of a woman that brought a hope on to last
Feelings I dismissed when I saw her,
But when we locked eyes, all that sorrow was through
Don't know how to end the feeling,
Sometimes it overtakes, can't deny it is real
Afraid I would get in love and fail,
Fall, never recover, so never begin I'd favor
Don't want to fall in love with someone discharge,
Taking time precious to get to be with someone
And I'm no longer ready for that roller coaster ride,
But with you we'll get through, for we share everything inside
Not confessing to you that you are my one,
You'll soon realize that you are my number one

Bridge:
I said I'm sorry a thousand times,
These fights, they only stay in mind
But I haven't shown you how much I love,
So we can now start all again and repair what needs be done.
